title: Official Announcement: Xabi Alonso - Real Madrid
snippet: Real Madrid C. F. confirms that Xabi Alonso will be the Real Madrid coach for the next three seasons, from 1 June 2025, until 30 June 2028. Xabi Alonso is a Real Madrid legend and one of the greatest players in world football history.

title: Inside Real Madrid: Have Vinicius Jr and Rodrygo saved Xabi Alonso from the sack? - The Athletic
snippet: Meanwhile, in the build-up to Sunday’s match over the weekend, several sources expected Alvaro Arbeloa, Madrid’s reserve team manager, to be named as Alonso’s successor if he is finally sacked. title: Reports Conflict on Real Madrid's Xabi Alonso Appointment Start Date
snippet: Transfer market expert Fabrizio Romano used his X account to reveal that Xabi Alonso has agreed to replace Carlo Ancelotti as Real Madrid head coach.

title: Real Madrid firing Alonso would be easy. Replacing him? Much harder - ESPN
snippet: Real Madrid manager Xabi Alonso may have bought himself more time and the lack of viable alternatives available right now might help keep him in the job. title: 8 Potential Replacements for Xabi Alonso as Real Madrid Head Coach
snippet: So, let's talk about the man at the center of all the drama: manager Xabi Alonso. The club's former midfield maestro took charge on June 1, succeeding the most decorated coach in Madrid's illustrious history, Carlo Ancelotti.
